attributes.action: To allow mobile hair stylists in England to reopen the same time as salons.
attributes.additional_details: If salons open first people will choose to go to salons in desperation resulting in Mobile hairdressers losing alot of business. This is unacceptable As we have been without financial support since 14th December and cannot claim next SEISS patent until late April.
attributes.background: There has been no data evidence to suggest that salons are safer than mobile stylists. We all need to be allowed to open at the same time to ensure everyone's survival. The Government need to provide proof for their actions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Government guidance has indicated that close-contact services can resume at the same time as salons are able to reopen. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
